text: Jabez Bayley (or Jabez Bailey), (1771 -1834), was an English ship builder based in Ipswich, East Anglia. ==Family life== Jabez married Miss Darby in May 1813. ==Merchant ships built by Jabez Bayley== * * * ==Naval vessels built by Jabez Bayley== * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==References== Category:British shipbuilders Category:1771 births Category:1834 deaths
title: Jabez Bayley
